name: Arcane Golem
text_description: The mighty Arcane Golem channels the raw power of the arcane to obliterate its enemies. When Arcane Golem enters the play, you may discard a card. If you do, Arcane Golem gets +2 attack until end of turn.
illustration_description: An imposing golem, made from pulsating arcane energy, stands in a battlefield. Its eyes glow with a deep blue light, and powerful, swirling energy surrounds its fists, ready to strike. The background is filled with magical runes and arcane symbols floating in the air.
